item.title: MQTT with example
item.description: What is MQTT ? MQTT : Message Queue Telemetry Transport It is a standard messaging protocal for IoT(Internet of Things) sector. This was especially built for Machine-To-Machine(M2M) communication. It is a simple, lightwieght but effective way to transport messages across a lot of devices with minimal bandwidth using publisher/subscriber model. Components of MQTT: MQTT Broker/Server: It is server which routes published data to the subscriber who subscribed to that topic.
